[b]Description :-[/b]

Attention! Buying the app right now will give you lifetime license and updates for all your devices.

Android Antivirus Plus antivirus is made to find and terminate any threats, malicious software or other suspicious applications installed on your device.

[b]Key features:-[/b]
- Android Antivirus Plus scans your system really fast, taking into account app permissions and known database of unwanted software.
- Antivirus is checking apps both from internal and external memory (SD cards).
- You can delete suspicious software directly from Android Antivirus Plus.
- Our app uses a really small amount of resources and doesn't affect your device performance.
- Antivirus uses a small amount of network resources in order to keep in touch with security center to stay up to date.

[b]What's New:- [/b]
v.1.07
-Added Spanish and Italian translations
-Small bugfixes
v.1.06
-Added language auto detection
-Added new translations
v.1.05
-Scan process made faster
-Added realtime protection of your device
-Checking newly installed applications for threats
-Small bugfixes

[b]For more info :- https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.abvcorp.badfiles[/b]
